hanzi-su-wiki:
渦

Значения

Водоворот

Мнемоника

Считалось, что жидкость 氵 в полых костях 咼 движется за счёт турбулентности, т.е. вращается.

Варианты

涡

heisig_chinese_memo: Grampa's flushing the toilet, when his denture (Jawbone) pops out and gets sucked down the whirlpool water!
heisig_constituent: whirlpool, water, water droplets, water pistol, jawbone, joint, hood, mouth
koohiiStory1: Grampa´s flushing the toilet, when his denture (Jawbone) pops out and gets sucked down the whirlpool!
koohiiStory2: A whirlpool is water opening its jaws to swallow anything whole.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you put two mustaches on either side of a tsunami it won't know which way to go and spin back and forth until it becomes as whirlpool. Mustaches are pretty gross, so I don't blame the tsunami for avoiding them.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the tsunami spinning in a circle, trying not to hit the mustaches until it spins itself into a giant whirlpool.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The whirlpool is huge, and it starts pulling things into itself. Oh no, is that my car (か)? Hey, wait! Whirlpool give my car back!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture my car getting sucked into the whirlpool. Picture me crying as my car disappears into it forever.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the gossiping (咼) water (氵) is a whirlpool
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When I eat Chinese hot pot I feel like there is a whirlpool of spiciness going down my esophagus so I drink lots of water.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " water " and "咼", the original meaning is the swirling water current. Jin Guopu's "Jiang Fu": "Pan Wu Gu Zhuan, Ling Tao Shan Heng."

" Vortex " can mean vortex or vortex. Tang Dufu "Accompanying Zheng Guangwen on a Tour of the Mountains and Forests of General He": "The vortex is deep and there is no horse, and the vines bend snakes."

" Worse " also refers to the Wo River, which originates from Tongxu County, Henan Province, flows through the northwest of Anhui Province and enters Huaihe River in Huaiyuan County. It is 382 kilometers long. Preface to "Linuo Fu" by Cao Pi of the Wei Dynasty of the Three Kingdoms: "Jing Dongyuan, Zun Guoshui, under the tall trees, Zhuma Shubian is the Fu of Lin Guo."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " water " and "咼", the original meaning is the swirling current.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「咼」聲，本義為迴旋的水流。晉郭璞〈江賦〉：「盤渦谷轉，淩濤山穨。」

　　「渦」可表示渦狀、漩渦形。唐杜甫〈陪鄭廣文游何將軍山林〉之四：「碾渦深沒馬，藤蔓曲垂蛇。」

　　「渦」也表示渦河，源出河南省通許縣，流經安徽省西北部，於懷遠縣入淮，長三百八十二公里。三國魏曹丕〈臨渦賦〉序：「經東園，遵渦水，相佯乎高樹之下，駐馬書鞭為《臨渦》之賦。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「咼」聲，本義為迴旋的水流。

渦(うず): swirl
從「 水 」，「 咼 」聲，本義為迴旋的水流。晉郭璞〈江賦〉：「盤渦谷轉，淩濤山穨。」 「 渦 」可表示渦狀、漩渦形。唐杜甫〈陪鄭廣文游何將軍山林〉之四：「碾渦深沒馬，藤蔓曲垂蛇。」 「 渦 」也表示渦河，源出河南省通許縣，流經安徽省西北部，於懷遠縣入淮，長三百八十二公里。三國魏曹丕〈臨渦賦〉序：「經東園，遵渦水，相佯乎高樹之下，駐馬書鞭為《臨渦》之賦。」
From the sound of " water" and " 咼", the original meaning is the swirling water current. Jin Guopu's "Jiang Fu": "Pan Wu Gu Zhuan, Ling Tao Shan Heng." " Vortex" can mean vortex or vortex. Tang Dufu "Accompanying Zheng Guangwen on a Tour of the Mountains and Forests of General He": "The vortex is deep and there is no horse, and the vines bend snakes." " Worse" also refers to the Wo River, which originates from Tongxu County, Henan Province, flows through the northwest of Anhui Province and enters Huaihe River in Huaiyuan County. It is 382 kilometers long. Preface to "Linuo Fu" by Cao Pi of the Wei Dynasty of the Three Kingdoms: "Jing Dongyuan, Zun Guoshui, under the tall trees, Zhuma Shubian is the Fu of Lin Guo."

渦字的基本解释

渦
wō

渦
guō
均见“涡”。

渦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wō］
［《廣韻》烏禾切，平戈，影。］
“涡1”的繁体字。
(1)水的旋流。
(2)涡状；漩涡形。
(3)用同“污”。沾染。
[②]［guō］
［《廣韻》古禾切，平戈，見。］
“涡2”的繁体字。
(1)水名。源出河南省通许县，流经安徽省西北部，于怀远县入淮，长三百八十二公里。
(2)姓。五代有涡信。见《资治通鉴·後梁均王乾化三年》。

渦字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　渦； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页634第07
【廣韻】【集韻】?古禾切，音戈。水名。與濄同。【前漢·地理志扶溝註】渦水首受狼湯渠，東至向入海。　又【集韻】姑華切，音瓜。義同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?烏禾切，音倭。水㘭也。【爾雅·釋水】渦辨回川。【註】旋流也。　又姓。【三輔決錄】有扶風太守渦尚。

渦字的源字形

渦字的起名意思

暂无。

eddy
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wō］
["Guangyun" Wuhe cut, Ping Ge, shadow. ]
Traditional characters for "vortex 1".
(1) The swirling flow of water.
(2) Swirl-shaped; swirl-shaped.
(3) Use the same as "dirty". Contaminate.
[②]［guō］
["Guangyun" Gu Heqie, Ping Ge, see. ]
Traditional characters for "Vortex 2".
(1) Water name. It originates from Tongxu County, Henan Province, flows through the northwest of Anhui Province, and enters Huaihe River in Huaiyuan County, with a length of 382 kilometers.
(2) Last name. There are scrolls in the Five Dynasties. See "Tongjian for Zizhi · Three Years after the King of the Second Liangjun".
eddy
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　Worse; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 634 No. 07
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Gu He cut, sound. Water name. Same with Yi. [Annotation to Fugou in Geographical History of the Former Han Dynasty] The vortex water is headed by the wolf soup canal, and reaches the sea in the east.　[Jiyun] Guhuaqie, Yingua. The same meaning.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Wuhe cut, sound widow. Water also. 【Erya·Shishui】The vortex discriminates back to Sichuan. [Note] Swirl also.　Another last name. [Sanfu Julu] There is Fufeng Prefect Wushang.

Radicals: 氵, 冋  (tsunami, mustache)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you put two mustaches on either side of a tsunami it won't know which way to go and spin back and forth until it becomes as whirlpool. Mustaches are pretty gross, so I don't blame the tsunami for avoiding them.
Picture the tsunami spinning in a circle, trying not to hit the mustaches until it spins itself into a giant whirlpool.
Reading Mnemonic
The whirlpool is huge, and it starts pulling things into itself. Oh no, is that my car (か)? Hey, wait! Whirlpool give my car back!
Picture my car getting sucked into the whirlpool. Picture me crying as my car disappears into it forever.
